title: Candelabra, 18th or 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs
description: Porcelain Chinoiserie figure of a young boy dressed in a yellow robe with flowered shawl, wearing a leaf cap and pink slippers, prancing beneath an ormolu bell-hung canopy on rustic supports; the base fitted with two scrolling enleafed candle arms bearing porcelain flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Candelabra, 18th or 19th century.
18th or 19th century. Porcelain, gilt bronze. Gift of Mrs. Howard J. Sachs and Mr. Peter G. Sachs in memory of Miss Edith L. Sachs. 1978-168-76.
